Player History
Traded from Chicago (N) to Washington on 2/6/2014 (Going to CHC: P Drew Storen, P Ross Detwiler. Going to WAS: P Duane Underwood, RF Jorge Soler)...
Had first career hit on 6/8/2015, off Max Scherzer (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/8/2015, off Ben Holmes (PHI)...
Injured on 7/16/2018 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Washington to Detroit on 4/1/2019 (Going to WAS: RF Avisail Garcia. Going to DET: RF Jorge Soler, P Michael Strader)...
Released by Detroit on 11/2/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Miami on 4/22/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $712,000 per year...
Injured on 6/24/2022 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 8-9 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/18/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/13/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $1,123,500 per year...
Released by Cleveland on 4/1/2025...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 4/1/2025 to a 1-year deal worth $808,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/18/2026 to a 2-year deal worth $1,703,500 per year...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 6/19/2026...
